refnamediv.refpurpose: a class that translates expressions in internal mCRL2 format to benchmarks in the SMT-LIB format

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The method &smt_lib_solver_translate; receives an expression of sort &sort_bool; in conjunctive normal form as parameter &par_formula; and translates it to a benchmark in SMT-LIB format. The result is saved as field &type_string; &var_benchmark;.

refsect1.title: Preconditions
refsect1.para:
The following precondition has to be satisfied for &smt_lib_solver_translate;:
The argument passed as parameter &par_formula; is a list of expressions of sort &sort_bool; in internal mCRL2 format. The argument represents a formula in conjunctive normal form, where the elements of the list represent the clauses
